title: What is "COLLEGE LIFE"
content: people say that "college life" is good or it sucks or its average when asked about any college. What is the meaning of college life? like is it events and celebrations or free time or something else? please explain to me

comments.body: Events, Clubs, Fests, Social Group, etc. Its basically like how much "fun" youll have in college, and what else the college offers other then academics
college life = what's your mental state in college while studying
Mental state while in PESU is one rollercoaster
You dont need to go to wonderla to experience the ride of your lifeüíÄ‚ú®Ô∏è
